data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3152190,"name":"","username":"ebrobotman","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/e/ac91a4/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-02-24T22:35:05.541Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eWe are trying to get the distance from the robot to a reflective tape target.  We are using a RasberryPi cam, the SnakeEyes hat and PhotonVision.  We can get accurate distance (x value) to a target using a Microsoft USB camera to an Apriltag using the AprilTag pipeline.  Our distance to target (x value) is way off when we use the Reflective Tape pipeline and the Snake Eyes IR with the Pi cam.  We have calibrated our camera multiple times and made all the adjustments as recommended on the PhotonVision site.  Has anyone had luck getting a somewhat accurate distance (x value) to the target using our combination of hardware and software?  If so how did you do it?\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":6,"updated_at":"2023-02-24T22:35:05.541Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":110,"reads":248,"readers_count":247,"score":599.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":427998,"topic_slug":"frc-2023-charged-up-reflective-tape-detection","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":57527,"hidden":false,"trust_level":0,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/frc-2023-charged-up-reflective-tape-detection/427998/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3152203,"name":"","username":"mdurrani834","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/mdurrani834/{size}/131246_2.png","created_at":"2023-02-24T22:51:59.140Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eAre you talking about the ditsance method in your code?
